name: Boiling Point, Chapter 1
description:
Hello! We are a bunch of college friends who decided to use our combined powers to make super gay, super wholesome content! We are based across the US and sometimes Mexico. The name "Noobi" comes from a weird way of reading the Spanish word for cloud ("nube"), while simultaneously representing our newbie status as developers. Meet our team!

  • DAN (they/them): social media and background artwork
  • MARIEL (she/her): music god
  • TULANI (they/them): character artwork
  • MOONFALL (she/her): #1 HackerBoy (coding)
